message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!

Thanks for the offer, Alice! I really appreciate it.  $180 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now. How about $135? It's a fair price for both of us, and I'm sure we can come to an agreement.

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $135. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $165. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. While $165 is closer to my budget, I'm still hoping we can find a price that works for both of us. I'm willing to go up to $145.  Let's see if we can find common ground.
I understand where you're coming from, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $155. It's a fair compromise, and I think you'll really love the product. Let's see if we can make a deal!
